com.artemis

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.World

  • public class World
extends Object
    The primary instance for the framework.

    It contains all the managers. You must use this to create, delete and retrieve entities. It is also important to set the delta each game loop iteration, and initialize before game loop.

    Author:
    Arni Arent

    • Constructor Detail

      • World

        public World()
        Creates a new world.

        An EntityManager and ComponentManager are created and added upon creation.

        Creates a new world.

        An EntityManager and ComponentManager are created and added upon creation.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public void initialize()
        Deprecated. automatically covered by WorldConfiguration.
        Makes sure all managers systems are initialized in the order they were added.

      • inject

        public void inject(Object target)
        Inject dependencies on object. Immediately perform dependency injection on the target. Wire annotation is required on the target or fields. If you want to specify nonstandard dependencies to inject, use WorldConfiguration.register(String, Object) instead, or configure an Injector If you want a non-throwing alternative, use inject(Object, boolean)
        Parameters:
        target - Object to inject into. throws MundaneWireException if target is not annotated with com.artemis.annotations.Wire
        See Also:
        for more details about dependency injection., inject(Object, boolean)

      • inject

        public void inject(Object target,
          boolean failIfWireAnnotationIsMissing)
        Inject dependencies on object if it is annotated with Wire. If Wire is missing, no action will be taken. If you want to specify nonstandard dependencies to inject, use WorldConfiguration.register(String, Object) instead, or configure an Injector
        Parameters:
        target - Object to inject into.
        failIfWireAnnotationIsMissing - if true, this method will throws MundaneWireException if target is not annotated with com.artemis.annotations.Wire and failIfWireAnnotationIsMissing is true
        See Also:
        for more details about dependency injection., inject(Object)

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes all managers and systems. Only necessary if either need to free managed resources upon bringing the world to an end.
        Throws:
        ArtemisMultiException - if any managers or systems throws an exception.

      • enable

        @Deprecated
public void enable(Entity e)
        Deprecated. create your own components to track state.
        (Re)enable the entity in the world, after it having being disabled.

        Won't do anything unless it was already disabled.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity to enable

      • disable

        @Deprecated
public void disable(Entity e)
        Deprecated. create your own components to track state.
        Disable the entity from being processed.

        Won't delete it, it will continue to exist but won't get processed.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity to disable

      • createEntity

        public Entity createEntity()
        Create and return a new or reused entity instance. Entity is automatically added to the world.
        Returns:
        entity

      • createEntity

        public Entity createEntity(Archetype archetype)
        Create and return an Entity wrapping a new or reused entity instance. Entity is automatically added to the world.
        Returns:
        entity

      • createEntity

        public Entity createEntity(UUID uuid)
        Create and return a new or reused entity instance.

        The uuid parameter is ignored if UuidEntityManager hasn't been added to the world.

        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID to give to the entity
        Returns:
        entity
